title: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago
summary: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title: It’s Finally Love, Demon Lord!
summary:
A work packed with stories that make you cry, smile, and heal. A compilation of original short stories, including commercial oneshots and manga previously published on Twitter or Pixiv.

List of Stories (in **bold** = scanlated):

1. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home (Oneshot)** (ようこそ亡霊葬儀屋さん (読切版)): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/72034786), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1394956053461315585).
One-shot version of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

2. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home - After Story** (一描き下ろし後日話)
A newly drawn after story of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

3. **My Childhood Friend Is a Crybaby** (俺の幼馴染みは泣き虫だ): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/79083715), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1374662950787551232).

4. **Four Patterns of Love** (4つの恋模様): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89467880).

5. **The God of Pestilence Picked up by Humans** (人間に拾われた疫病神): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88553623), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1372125964876931075).

06. **To You at 17** (17歳のキミへ。): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/79817585), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1217750845460058112).
A mysterious high school girl appeared and sent letters to Mirai.

7. **Just an Office Lady Eating Ramen** (OLさんがラーメンを食べるだけ): Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1414132353115426816).

8. **Seeing the Sea With an Angel** (天使と一緒に海を見る): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89166096), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1382272880931532804).

9. **WORLD END WANKO**: Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1512347577408053250?cxt=HHwWhICjhfyG-PwpAAAA).

10. **The Tired Office Lady's One Comfort in Life** (佐藤さんと鬼上司天野さん): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/75086414), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1384809850538917895).

11. **The Story of a Cat That Has Lived for 100 Years** (100年生きた猫の話): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89015686), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1464174470495498249).
This is a story of a cat that has become immortal, wandering through the course of its lifetime to find happiness.

12. **Shimono-kun's Quiet Girlfriend** (無口な下野くんの彼女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/88224680), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1367052638500495360).

13. **The Demon Lord Defeated by the Hero and the Slave Girl** (勇者に敗れた魔王と奴隷少女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88878648), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1377199075192303618).

14. **The Boy Who Had Grown to Hate Manga** (漫画が嫌いになった少年): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89807719), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1392419305199788032).

title: The Count’s Secret Maid
summary:
"Please teach us naughty things."

One day, Itsuki is transported to another world, where he is confronted by sisters who serve the goddess. In order to return to the real world, he must give them practical sex education!

title: How to Perfectly End a Contract Marriage
summary:
To bring her beloved back, she turned back time, becoming terminally ill with only a year to live. She tried reuniting him with his past love but failed.

“Marry me for just one year.” Why is he proposing this?  “I will only have one wife. You’ll be my first and last, Charlotte.”

title: I’m A Super Rich Man, So It’s Reasonable For Me To Be A Scumbag
summary: Jiang Cheng woke up and was reborn! He was also bound to the Godly Rich System. Every second the world runs, he can get money! As the system continues to upgrade, Jiang Cheng's wealth has skyrocketed. All the cool school beauties and queen bosses are around him. Jiang Cheng laughed up to the sky. In his previous life, he was trapped by the things that he couldn't get when he was young for so long. Now that he is reborn, who cares about those broken rules! Let's drink and enjoy it first.

title: Moonshark: Sharks Are Born To Be Stars
summary:
Princess Sid of the Underwater Kingdom is destined to inherit the throne of the sea. However, she becomes a fan of the land idol 'Raon', and she becomes eager to see her favourite star, so she runs away to the surface.
While leading a satisfying life as an ordinary fan, Sid's world is suddenly turned upside down when she meets the famous actor 'Jihan'. Unintentionally, the two keep getting entangled with each other, and Sid unexpectedly becomes an SNS star overnight…!!
This story captures Sid's journey of growth and love as she navigates her new life on land, discovering herself between the two worlds of the underwater kingdom and the human world.

---
Sid, who is a Shark Princess of the underwater kingdom, falls in love with Raun, a member of the boy band BUB, and runs away to the surface to see him. Things are going great until the famous teen actor, Jihan Kang, steps into her life unexpectedly and they keep crossing paths. Will Sid be able to keep her secret and get what she came up to the surface for?

title: The Monster Duke Mistook Me for His Wife
summary: No summary available.

title: The Real Daughter, She Is an Almighty Boss
summary: A highly skilled fighter wakes up in someone else's body and discovers that she's the Huffmans' lost daughter Gemma, regarded as socially inferior to her adoptive sister and a human punching bag for her Aunt Elodie. Her father doesn't care about her. Her mother is ashamed of her. Just when everyone thinks Gemma is going to make a complete fool of herself, they get a slap in the face.

title: The Almighty Daughter Runs The World
summary:
After traveling through time and space, Ye Zhuo became a fake daughter of a wealthy family and a notorious bastard that everyone disdained. But so what? Although Ye Zhuo was dealt a bad hand, she would still win.

Ye Zhuo quickly made room for the real daughter of the wealthy family and then helped her mother and uncle get rich overnight.

As an unparalleled talented woman, she became the head of a technology firm and had a fortune of hundreds of billions of dollars, directly reaching the pinnacle of her life! Meanwhile, she was having a relationship with a wealthy tycoon who always doted on her!

title: The Saintess Returns as a Villain
summary: Beatrice has lived as a saint for 10 years to prevent the disaster of the empire and win the love of her family. One day, her place as a saint was taken away by a girl named Lina Cumbell with her black hair... “I will kill you, your family, and all your followers.” She is framed as a warlock and executed. Beatrice's second life began like that. “Even if this life becomes a villainess… Lina, I will avenge you!!” The new life of Riche, a true saint who decided to become a villain, is redrawn.

title: To My Husband’s Mistress
summary:
Kosuke found himself in a whole different world. Standing there with the wilderness to the east and a forest to his left, he decided to make good use of the occurrence, and tests his knowledge, to where he finds this amazing crafting ability, just like the games from his original world! ――This is a light for life in a different world. When I thought, I was suddenly attacked by a beautiful dark elf...?!
___
- [Official LN (Eng)](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/survival-in-another-world-with-my-mistress-light-novel/)

title: LV. 99 The Princess of Dark Flare
I Become a fool when it comes to my Daughter
summary:
I've become a single father!

24-year-old Juwon Lee works part-time at a convenience store and lives alone in his small apartment. One day his uncle passes away and leaves behind a 4-year-old daughter, the cute little Yeondu. Instead of letting her be sent to an orphanage, Juwon steps up and decides to be her new guardian.

title: The Killer’s Interview
summary:
Hajun, who lost his parents and lived with his grandmother, has become a police officer to uncover the truth behind his parents’ deaths, but life as a patrol officer is far from the detective career he once dreamed of. It’s nothing but exhausting.

“I wish legendary detectives would appear and give me a clue about the case.”

Feeling frustrated, he visits the old vinyl house where he once lived with his parents…

There, he finds a book that belongs to his father.

When he opens the book, what appears before Hajun’s eyes are legendary murderers?

Wait, why are you here?!

title: The Villainous Priestess Doesn’t Want Salvation
Fell Into the Arms of a Mad Villain
summary:
Instead of being caught by Prince Charming, I've fallen into a complete nightmare! Not only did I transmigrate into a trashy romance fantasy novel, but I fell from the sky and ended up in the arms of the mad villain, Edwin Crawford. Before I knew it, he called me his wife from the heavens and was raving about some prophecy. I don't even know who I am, so how can I be his wife?! Until I figure out what is happening, will it be safe to stay in the embrace of the Mad Dragon of the West?

---
**Link:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Kakao Webtoon](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/미친-악당의-품으로-떨어졌다/3708)

title: Worthless Profession: Dragon Tamer
summary: Combining reality with a gaming world where ferocious beasts roam freely, filled with numerous mysteries and dungeons. In order to defend against the onslaught of these beasts, everyone undergoes class transfers and crazily levels up. On the day of his transfer, Lu Fan becomes a hidden class – Dragon Tamer. However, due to the immense strength of dragons, it is deemed impossible for anyone to tame them, earning Dragon Tamer the reputation of being the most useless class. Fortunately, he awakens the Super Treasure Map System. As Lu Fan, with his mighty dragon, sweeps through everything, the entire world trembles.

title: See You Offline
summary: Made only for customizing, 'Beast Sword' is played by Yeo-ri, an adult who plays the game with excessive immersion. She meets a newbie player named Lex, who appears outwardly to her taste and eventually succeeds in getting married to him. "To commemorate the wedding we decided to meet at an off-site to make a perfume, but why was my co-worker, who I'm uncomfortable with at work, at the meeting place...?"

title: Madam and Her Daily Online Face-Slapping
summary: The Gu family, the leader of the Jijing Continent, was plotted against, and the family was separated. The head of the young family, Gu Mang, took her younger brother, Gu Si, disguising themselves, to regain power, beat the villain, avenge the family, gain glory, and pick up the top handsome president along the way.

title: My Fake Love
summary: Megumi, a 32-year-old surgeon, navigates heartbreak, unexpected romance, and personal growth. After her boyfriend of seven years, abruptly ends their relationship, Megumi's world crumbles. Even worse, she gets invited to his engagement party. To avoid embarrassment, Megumi enlists the help of her junior colleague, Dr. Akiho, to pose as her boyfriend. Akiho agrees, but his motivations are not entirely altruistic. As they continue the charade, genuine feelings begin to surface between Megumi and Akiho. Their budding relationship faces numerous obstacles, including Akiho's arranged engagement to his childhood friend, Marika, and familial pressures. Megumi also confronts her own insecurities and past traumas, particularly concerning marriage and family. Throughout the series, Megumi and Akiho support each other through personal and professional challenges, gradually building a deep and authentic connection. The story culminates in a heartfelt conclusion where they confront their fears and embrace a future together.

title: Best Actor in a Relationship Award
summary: Ji-eun, an aspiring director attending the nation's top art school. Ji-eun, who is unknown, wants to cast Jae-ha, the top student in the acting department, to make her work successful and make a name for herself at school. On the other hand, Jae-ha proposes a romantic relationship to Ji-eun in order to get rid of a senior he dislikes. Ji-eun, who is fooled by the acting genius, wants to complete both her school life and her love life. Will she be able to kill two birds with one stone?

title: Primordial Ten Fiends: Others Tame Beasts, I Tame Beast Girls
summary: After three years of lying low, Lin Han awakened the Beast Taming System and gained ten ultra-fierce beast girls! Tearing apart enemies by day and taming beast girls by night, he was directly drained by them into becoming the pinnacle of global combat power!

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Surviving as a PD Idol
summary:
A notorious PD, despised by everyone, becomes an unknown idol in a parallel world.
Only his younger sibling remembers him fully.
To return to his original world, he must become a top idol and clear the game!

"...Quest accepted."
"Are you crazy?"
"Gotta eat to live, don't I?"

His specialty is intimidation, his hobby is persuasion.
The idol survival story of a ruthless PD who stops at nothing!

title: The Symbiotic Relationship Between the Rabbit and the Black Panther
summary:
I was a rabbit shapeshifter who couldn't even transform into a human by my coming of age ceremony. My family said that I was just a halfling and placed me in a basket…

"You're crying? Go on, cry more."

Then I was then picked up by a black panther with an awful personality.

"You're lacking in fighting spirit. I'll eat you the day after tomorrow, so keep trying."

This fierce beast. Staring at my trembling face, the black panther's eyes glistened.

"How thrilling."

Mom, I think he's crazy! To survive a fairly crazy black panther.

"The wild beasts are possessive, no matter what it is."

…Is it possible?

---
Vivi is a... wererabbit?! As a creature that’s supposed to transform into a human, Vivi is a failure, demonized as cursed and sent off to her doom. Luckily, her demise is cut short as Ahin of the Black Leopard Clan saves her. But with every threat and command this temperamental heir tosses at Vivi, she’s questioning her safety (and sanity). Surrounded by carnivores and their strong pheromones, she'll try to survive the chaos while stuck in her rabbit form. Will she figure out how to transform and tap into the power within her cute, furry self?

title: The Tutor’s Secret Sessions [Official]
What’s Happening in Lindell?
summary:
Claudia, the successor of the priest family, is framed by her half-brother and demoted to a remote territory.

Adjacent to the land of the dead, such as undead and vampires, the ‘priests’ graveyard’ where priests suffer from hard labor, the Lindel Monastery!

"I have to stay in this abandoned house for 3 years?!"

title: Finally, the Dawn Came
summary: Nobita, the lazy boy who always cries and depends on Doraemon, finally studies hard and becomes a scientist in order to repair and save his best friend.

title: If the Flame Swallows Me
I Was Reincarnated as a Villainous Young Lady, but I Have No Desire to Get Married!
The Heavenly Demon Becomes an Idol
summary:
One day, a handsome man dressed in martial arts attire appeared in front of Manager Jeom So-Eui of the martial arts idol group 'Noble Alliance'. Introducing himself as 'The Heavenly Demon, Wi Hwajin', the man abruptly declared his intention to become an idol. Jeom So-Eui tried to pass this problem to the martial arts fanatic CEO of K-tsch, the agency of 'Noble Alliance', but the suspiciously wealthy martial arts enthusiast decided to let the Heavenly Demon join 'Noble Alliance'.

The Heavenly Demon, who claimed to represent the righteous faction, entered 'Noble Alliance'! However, there is a hidden motive behind the Heavenly Demon joining 'Noble Alliance' that even Jeom So-Eui doesn't know about....

title: The Knight King Who Returned with a God
summary:
I returned to Earth after hunting demons in the otherworld for three hundred years. However, I did not return alone.

**Official Translations**
[Simplified Chinese](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/yushentongguideqishiwang/list?title_no=2594) 
[Traditional Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-king-of-knights-returns-with-god/list?title_no=5491)

title: CTRL X
summary:
My ex-boyfriend of ten years, Daniel,
 married my best friend, Olivia, on
 Christmas, which is also my birthday! To
 add to the drama, world-renowned singer-
 songwriter Chris made a surprise
 appearance at their wedding, transforming
 it into a concert venue as a form of sweet
 revenge. However, the following morning,
 Chris receives some shocking news. Will
 she be able to reclaim her lost love.
 friendship, and fame?

title: The Silent Sacrifice Princess And The Black Dragons Marriage
summary:
Ayame, born into a family of priestesses blessed by the Black Dragon God, possesses a unique ability to heal people through her voice. However, after the death of her parents, she is taken in by her uncle's family who mistreat her, leading to the loss of her voice. Her cousin Mari even takes over Ayame’s rightful position as priestess, and Ayame is eventually offered as a sacrifice to the Black Dragon.

"Why must I be killed like this?! Someone, please help me!"

Her desperate plea brought forth the Black Dragon from the sky. He descends and transforms into a handsome young man, gently takes Ayame's hand, and flies away with her.

Thus begins Ayame’s new life as the bride of Saku, the Black Dragon, living in his mansion situated between the celestial and human worlds. However, Ayame’s cousin Mari, envious of her new status as the beautiful bride of the Black Dragon schemes to steal him away...

A Japanese-style Cinderella story of a gentle-hearted girl who lost her voice and a proud yet compassionate Black Dragon.

---
The Kozuki family was granted the Black Dragon's blessing, allowing them to heal the sick and purify impurity with their voices alone. But Ayame's life shatters after her parents' death, leaving her at the mercy of her cruel aunt and uncle, who tortured her until she lost her voice. As their daughter, Mari, rises to become the new priestess, Ayame is offered as a sacrifice to the Black Dragon.

"Why do I have to die like this? Please help me!"

In response to her desperate plea, the Black Dragon appears as a striking man and takes her hand, whisking her away to his realm. Chosen to be the bride of the Black Dragon Saku, Ayame finds herself in the enchanting Black Dragon Manor, suspended between the heavens and the human world. But jealousy ignites in Mari, who vows to reclaim Saku and make Ayame suffer once more.

title: I Thought It’s a Common Possession
summary: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?

title: The Sold Young Lady Is Protected by Her Brothers
Bullshit
summary:
When CEO Jung Taeon mentioned he would stay for a month at Yeonghwadang, Sahee didn’t think much of it. He was merely a valued guest who would never get involved with someone as insignificant as her. However, the rude and endlessly arrogant man had a different perspective.

“Yeon Sahee, why don’t we sleep together?”

Sahee felt a mix of discomfort and unease, but his unpredictable demeanor continues to unsettle her..

title: She Is Obsessed With the Possessive Flame Emperor
When the Black Wolf Calls Me
summary:
"You can never have me. The one who can kill me, is me, not you."

Yeonwoo killed herself in front of her ex-husband who murdered her family. Yet, she found herself back again.

To escape from my ex-husband Hyojo's obsession, to protect my family and to protect myself... I ask another man to take me.

"Hwita, I'll be your woman!"

title: Please Shoot Me
summary:
A Saintess born through divine prophecy, granted the powers of the gods, is called the "Holy Maiden". She delivers divine blessings and words of love, healing both body and soul with sacred power.

"From birth until death."

That’s how it was supposed to be.

And yet, despite being a Holy Maiden, she turned to black magic. She offered living sacrifices, used forbidden knowledge, and performed a demon summoning ritual.

And then — a real demon actually appeared?!

She made just one wish to the demon:

“I want to live in a safe, peaceful place where no one knows me, with plenty of comfort and quiet.”

In response, the demon brought her to the Demon Realm a place where no one knows he, just as promised and offered to let her live in his own luxurious and quiet castle.

But… the castle wasn’t empty.

It was filled with the demon’s family members, all powerful demons themselves.

And now they say they’ll decide by majority vote whether she can stay in their castle…?!

title: Indulge In Me, My Prince, But Stay Away From The Abyss
summary: In a world where the conflict between humans and demons has continued since ancient times, Coral, codenamed , who has been raised as a spy since childhood, is entrusted with the important mission of infiltrating the Demon King's castle. However, due to the strategy of a certain person, the mission fails early on, and she is imprisoned in the Demon King's castle. What she saw there was the tragic end of the war caused by the magic rampage of Aries, the Demon King's son. If only she could redo this mission and prevent the prince's rampage... Wishing so strongly, Coral obtains the "Book of Time Travel," which allows her to go back to the past only once. What becomes newly visible during the re-do mission is the side of Prince Aries that he can't tell anyone about?!

title: My Contractually Married Husband Wants Me
Evolution Begins With A Big Tree
summary: One minute, he was choking on water, and the next, he found himself in a canyon and turned into a willow tree! Before he could reconcile with this new sad reality, the world decided to throw him another curveball. With the return of spirit energy, every living thing started to mutate, and his life was soon turned into a game of survival. Luckily, he was gifted with the ability of infinite evolution. But was it really a blessing? Or was it also a curse in disguise?

title: Seduce Her
summary: Harold is the descendant of the hero who defeated the evil demon king. In this peaceful era, Harold has become a convenient handyman for the townsfolk. One day, a sacred book predicting the world's destruction is discovered. The condition to avert this catastrophe is... "you must complete the 'Newlyweds Quest' with the demon king's daughter." Thus begins Harold's unexpected married life with Yona, the demon king's daughter. While Harold still feels bewildered by all this, not only can Yona perfectly handle the household chores, she sweetly pampers him when he's tired. However, she harbors a secret...

title: Like A Wind On A Dry Branch
summary:
Count Casarius fell victim to a plague and died suddenly, leaving behind a will stating that Rietta, a beautiful young widow of the manor, whom he tried to use as a concubine, be buried alive alongside him. Just before Rietta is buried, Archduke Axias, rumored to be a cruel tyrant, arrives at the funeral to collect the enormous debt Count Casarius still owes him.

"Everyone here seems to feel sorry for her, and I still have a debt to collect from Casarius… If I take her instead, I think all of you here should be happy," he smiled, "Hello, my temptress."

---
As plague and turmoil afflicts the empire, enchanting widow Rieta Tristi finds herself at the mercy of a malicious nobleman and his dying wish to have her buried alive beside his corpse. The plague has taken her husband, slave traders have taken her young child, and now her own life is at risk -- until an unexpected visit from the empire's outcast prince changes everything.

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=676625), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=2987280), [Yonder (English)](https://www.yonderstory.com/)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5489043), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=748535&weekday=wed)

* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/fantasy/like-wind-on-a-dry-branch/list?title_no=2585)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/cursed-blessing/list?title_no=2298)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001066)
* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/fantasy/like-wind-on-a-dry-branch/list?title_no=2682)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/cursed-blessing/list?title_no=2330)

title: The Scent That Binds Us
summary:
1945, Ueno. The souls of those that lost everything burst at the ruins left by the war.  
  
Kanekichi, a war orphan who lost his family continues to struggle in despair.  
But upon meeting a mysterious young man, Kanaida, the boy's heart starts unraveling …?

title: We Lost Our Engagement
summary: The story is set on one day during summer vacation. It follows a group of boys who try to view a fireworks display from the town lighthouse to see if they look round or flat when viewed from the side. Meanwhile, one of the boys, Norimichi, receives an invitation from his crush Nazuna to run away with her.

title: Before I knew it, I had stolen the Dark Lord’s Heart
summary:
Seeing the relationship between Duke Willow, the Sword of the North, and her father who's his guardian knight, Celine has been looking forward to meeting her lord, Damian. However, the Damian she encountered was a skinny, frail boy with a bright smile that belied his Northern Majesty. To fulfil her duty as a guardian knight, she decided to take her lord's side, no matter what kind of person he was. But there's something fishy about this frail boy...

---
Ten-year-old Celine Mars dreams of becoming a great knight escort just like her father. She’s set to serve under Damien Willow, the heir of a powerful Duke. There’s only one problem—he’s a total weakling, or so she thinks. Celine vows to train the poor, defenseless Damien to stand up for himself, completely unaware of his real strength. Meanwhile, Damien instantly takes a liking to Celine, finding her cluelessness and pure intentions both amusing and endearing. When will Celine finally realize she’s got the wrong idea about Damien?

title: Sovereign and Heartburn
summary: Aria’s world is thrown into chaos when Crown Prince Julius, the brilliant but insufferable royal she’s sworn to protect as Captain of his Guard, announces her as his future bride. Stunned, Aria confronts him, and Julius offers a way out: if she can defeat him in any competition before the wedding in six months, he’ll cancel the engagement. But with Julius’ unmatched skills, winning won’t be easy. Can Aria outsmart the talented prince and reclaim her life?

title: Lover Of Green Midnight
summary:
One day, Nao Anekawa was asked by a strange talking mascot if she would like to appear on TV. Although she refused, she was forced to sign a contract, and before she knew it, she had been taken to a place she didn't know... 13 other men had also been brought there. They were all great men who had left their mark on history!! What's more, the TV program she will be appearing on with them is a love reality show!? Together with the 13 great men, this struggling girl will search for her one and only "destiny"!

(Source: Comic Zenon, translated)
